name: Brogni Ironhand
title: Supply Master
description: A stocky dwarf with soot-stained hands and a no-nonsense demeanor. His shop is crammed with sturdy, practical gear that can survive the harsh mountain conditions.

greeting.first_time: Aye, welcome! Brogni Ironhand's the name. Ye need supplies that won't fail ye in the depths? Ye've come to the right place!
greeting.returning: Back again, eh? Good to see ye. What'll it be?
greeting.low_gold: Business has been brisk today—my coin pouch is runnin' dry. Can't buy much more 'til I make some sales.

traveling_to_work.text: Mornin'! Headin' to the shop to open up. Stop by if ye need quality gear!

traveling_home.text: Shop's closed for the night, friend. I'm headin' home. Come back tomorrow!

off_duty.text: I'm off duty, friend. Visit me shop during business hours if ye need supplies!

main_menu.text: What can I get for ye?

browse_shop.text: Take a look! Every item built to last—dwarven quality, guaranteed. No shoddy goods here!

ask_about_durability.text: Every piece o' gear in this shop is tested personal-like. If it can't survive a trip into the mines, it don't make it onto me shelves. That's the dwarven way!

goodbye.text: Stone and steel keep ye safe! Come back anytime!
